tasks.title: Greet Muslims
tasks.description: Greet at least 10 Muslims today with 'As-salamu alaykum' and respond fully with 'Wa alaykum as-salam wa rahmatullahi wa barakatuh'.
tips: Smile while greeting, it increases barakah.
Initiate the salam first for extra reward.

tasks.title: Pray Fajr in Jama'ah
tasks.description: Pray Fajr Salah in congregation at the mosque today to gain extra rewards and blessings.
tips: Sleep early to wake up fresh for Fajr.
Make wudhu before sleeping to make waking up easier.

tasks.title: Share Islamic Knowledge
tasks.description: Share a Hadith, Qur’an ayah, vazhivilakk, or a 1-minute Islamic talk with at least one person today.
tips: Keep it short and relevant.
Send it via WhatsApp or social media if you can't meet in person.

tasks.title: Use Islamic Phrases
tasks.description: Use Islamic phrases openly such as 'JazakAllahu Khair', 'Insha’Allah', 'MashAllah', and 'SubhanAllah' at least 5 times today.
tips: Use them naturally in daily conversations.
Encourage others to use them too.

tasks.title: Maintain Visible Islamic Identity
tasks.description: Show your Islamic identity proudly: use fragrance (itr) for men, wear modest clothing, keep beard/hijab, and maintain dignity.
tips: Dress modestly according to Sunnah.
Be consistent in maintaining identity daily.
